text: Jane Wagner (born February 26, 1935) is an American writer, director, stage actor and producer. She was born in Morristown, Tennessee. Wagner is best known as Lily Tomlin's comedy writer, collaborator and wife. She is the author of The Search for Signs of Intelligent Life in the Universe, The Incredible Shrinking Woman and other Tomlin vehicles. == References == Category:Drama Desk Award winners Category:Emmy Award winners Category:Peabody Award winners Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:American playwrights Category:American screenwriters Category:American television writers Category:American television directors Category:American television producers Category:American stage actors Category:Lesbian feminists Category:LGBT actors Category:American LGBT writers Category:LGBT people from Tennessee Category:Actors from Tennessee Category:Writers from Tennessee
title: Jane Wagner
